title: Hour 2: AFC Favorite?
description:
Marcus Spears debates why, despite the loss, the Chargers are still the team to beat in the AFC. Stephen A. is giving Bryce Young the early edge in the Heisman Race. After Dak Prescott's injury, Stephen A says Cooper Rush is under a lot of pressure. Should the Bucs still be the favorite to win the NFC South? Plus, the latest installment of Molly's Deal!
